headline.sub: GRAPHIC CONTENT Friend of UK aid worker beheaded by IS: "I salute you, my friend."
headline.main: GRAPHIC CONTENT Friend of UK aid worker beheaded by IS: "I salute you, my friend."

lead_paragraph: GRAPHIC CONTENT A second British hostage held by Islamic State is named as Alan Henning. Henning appears at the end of a video released on the internet by the Islamic militant group that purports to show the killing of British aid worker David Haines. Gavino Garay reports.
